description: Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

title: Aeon Flux
description: Charlize Theron stars as Aeon Flux, the underground operative fighting totalitarian rule in the 25th-century Earth's last living city. Aeon is the rebels' best hope of overthrowing the oppressively sterile, "perfect" society.

title: American Dragons
description: When detective Tony Luca (Michael Biehn) blows his undercover gig with the mob, he's shipped off to the homicide department and given a new partner, Kim (Joong-Hoon Park), who has come to the U.S. from Korea to investigate a murder tied to the Yakuza gang. Their cultures and personalities clash, and the two don't get along -- until the mob and the Yakuza start a war, complete with hired assassins. Forced to keep the peace together, the partners try to put aside their differences.

title: The Cold Light of Day
description: Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver and Henry Cavill star in this pulse-pounding thriller about a man trying to save his kidnapped family.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
description: Keanu Reeves is an alien who arrives on Earth with a warning for mankind: stop poisoning the planet or face extermination.

title: Demolition Man
description: A Los Angeles policeman and his ruthless nemesis from 1996 -- are sentenced to frozen incarceration as inmates -- into 2032 when they re-enter a bewildering and pacifist society.

title: Extreme Justice
description: Jeff Powers is the newest member of a very elite and secret LAPD division. Their mission is to target important criminals. Police brutality is not a known term for the division and they will stop at nothing to get the job done.

title: The Hanoi Hilton
description: A dramatic film uncovering the horrors that endured by POWs in a Vietnamese prison camp for almost ten years.

title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
description: An in-flight toke lands the White Castle-worshipping pot pals in Guantanamo Bay as suspected terrorists in this hilarious sequel.

title: Hell on the Border
description: Inspired by the incredible true story of Bass Reeves, the first black deputy US marshal. In order to become a lawman, Bass accepts an assignment that no other marshal will take: eliminating Bob Dozier, the most dangerous outlaw in the Indian Territory.

title: Invasion U.S.A.
description: An attack takes place on U.S. soil as a group of multinational terrorists attempt to take over the country. Ex-CIA man Matt Hunter (Chuck Norris) is recruited to take on his old foe, the leader of the terrorists.

title: The Last Boy Scout
description: When the stripper he's guarding is gunned down, flea-bitten gumshoe Bruce Willis teams up with her boyfriend to find the killers.

title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
description: Rynn's father's dying wish is for his daughter to continue to have autonomy even after he's gone. To prepare her, he trains the teen to live independently and keep a low profile. When neighbors catch wind she's alone, not everyone has pure intentions.

title: Mad Money
description: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

title: The Mechanic
description: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller that co-stars Jan-Michael Vincent and Jill Ireland.

title: Outbreak
description: Doctors try to stop a deadly virus spreading through a California town.

title: Rambo
description: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up.

title: Stargate
description: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

title: The Terminator
description: Arnold Schwarzenegger is unforgettable as an unstoppable cyborg who is sent back in time to kill a young woman in this sci-fi classic.

title: Trolls World Tour
description: When the kingdom is invaded by Rock Trolls, Queen Poppy (Anna Kendrick) and Branch (Justin Timberlake) embark on an epic quest to find the harmony that will save them all.

title: Wanted
description: A frustrated office worker finds his calling as a member in a secret society of assassins in this eye-popping action-thriller.

title: Barbershop
description: An eventful day in the life of a barbershop on Chicago's south side is the setting for this hit comedy..

title: Reasonable Doubt
description: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime.

title: Mississippi Burning
description: When three civil rights workers disappear in 1964 Mississippi, two FBI agents with wildly divergent styles resort to increasingly violent tactics to apprehend the culprit Ku Klux Klan. Crucial to the case is the testimony of a beautician.

title: 50 First Dates
description: A man falls in love with a woman after a memorable encounter. However, he discovers that she suffers from severe short-term memory loss and has no idea who he is. To win her, he must get her to fall in love with him all over again every day.

title: Anywhere But Here
description: A free-spirited woman in search of a better life leaves her husband and drives to L.A. with her teenage daughter.

title: Back to School
description: Thornton Melon (Rodney Dangerfield) is concerned that his son Jason (Keith Gordon) is unsure whether to go to college, so the uneducated self-made millionaire encourages him by signing up as a student as well. As Jason tries to establish himself among his peers and make the diving team, Thornton falls for a pretty professor (Sally Kellerman) and gets others do his schoolwork for him. When the suspicious dean (Paxton Whitehead) finds out, Thornton needs to show he can get by on his own.

title: Bad Girls From Mars
description: This movie within a movie has a sexy vixen from Europe arriving in Hollywood to star in a sci-fi flick where everybody is done-in before, during, and after some dangerous bedroom liaisons.

title: Because I Said So
description: Diane Keaton stars with Mandy Moore and Lauren Graham in this comedy about a worried mother who meddles in her daughter's love life, doing all the wrong things for all the right reasons.

title: The Binge
description: In the not so distant future all drinking and drugs have been made completely illegal by the government... except for one night a year. High school seniors, Griffin, Hags and Andrew make a pilgrimage to get to the best party in town where all their dreams will come true... Sure they will have to avoid their crazed principal (Vince Vaughn), violent siblings and the wild animals roaming the streets, but that’s all part of the fun! Their friendship will be tested, love lives will be rattled and their brains completely scrambled. One thing is for sure, no one’s life is EVER the same after participating in The Binge

title: The Birdcage
description: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

title: Boogie Woogie
description: Modern art collectors in London scheme to acquire a valuable painting.

title: Broken Lizard's Club Dread
description: A serial killer stalks victims at a hedonistic island resort in this screwball slasher spoof from the comedy troupe Broken Lizard.

title: California Dreamin' (Nesfarsit)
description: A railway chief delays a shipment of weapons for NATO forces during the Kosovo War in 1999.

title: A Complete History of My Sexual Failures
description: A hilarious and raunchy true story about a filmmaker who interviews his ex's about why they dumped him to try and figure out why his love life is such a disaster.

title: Cool Blue
description: Aspiring Los Angeles painter Dustin (Woody Harrelson) has a one-night stand with the beautiful but mysterious Christiane (Ely Pouget), and then realizes she may be the muse he needs to get his art career started. Unfortunately, Christiane disappears just after the tryst, so Dustin, accompanied by his best friend, Buzz (Hank Azaria), scours Southern California in search of her. Along the way, Dustin and Buzz meet a slew of oddballs, including beatnik plumber Phil (Sean Penn).

title: The Cutting Edge
description: A hockey player teams up with a cantankerous figure skater.

title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold
description: When Jackie, a 19 year-old Olympic-bound figure skater attempts to make a comeback from a career threatening injury, she finds an unlikely partner in a cocky, multi-talented skateboarder.

title: Employee of the Month
description: A superstore slacker competes with a model employee to impress a girl.

title: Evil Dead II
description: Sam Raimi's full-throttle sequel finds whacked-out dead basher Ash battling another batch of possessed pals at a remote cabin.

title: The Festival
description: After his girlfriend dumps him at graduation, a young man thinks his life is over. His best friend has the perfect solution: three days at a giant music festival.

title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
description: A Korean-American investment banker and his Indian-American roommate, a medical school candidate, get intoxicated and go looking for a White Castle fast-food restaurant in New Jersey.

title: Hooking Up
description: A cynical writer and a hopeless romantic hit the road for a cross-country trip.

title: I Feel Pretty
description: A woman wakes up from a fall believing she is the prettiest woman on earth.

title: Love Is All There Is
description: The Malacicis, a hard-working Italian family recently immigrated from Florence, open a fancy restaurant in the Bronx, N.Y., drawing the ire of another clan. Mike (Joseph Bologna) and Sadie Capomezzo (Lainie Kazan), equally hard-working Sicilian caterers from the area, find they cannot stand Piero (Paul Sorvino) and Maria Malacici (Barbara Carrera). But things get complicated when the Malacicis' daughter, Gina (Angelina Jolie), and the Capomezzos' son, Rosario (Nathaniel Marston), fall in love.

title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
description: Rafe hatches a plan to break every rule in his school's code of conduct.

title: Mr. North
description: In an opulent New England community, an Ivy Leaguer causes a stir with what seem to be mysterious curative abilities. Theophilus North (Anthony Edwards) takes a teaching job in Newport, R.I., where he befriends wealthy local Mr. Bosworth (Robert Mitchum). Theophilus has a biological quirk that enables him to emanate electrical charges, which appear to heal various ills. Though Persis (Anjelica Huston), Mr. Bosworth's granddaughter, has his back, his unique talent isn't without complications.

title: Music Within
description: A deaf Vietnam veteran becomes an advocate for the disabled.

title: Not Another Teen Movie
description: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated.

title: Pee-Wee's Big Adventure
description: When Pee-wee Herman's idyllic world is destroyed by the theft of his fire-engine red bicycle, the pre-pubescent adult sets out on a manic cross-country odyssey to recover his most valued possession. Director Tim Burton makes his feature-film debut with this comic masterpiece.

title: Pieces of April
description: A headstrong young woman (Katie Holmes) who has alienated her parents is forced to confront their troubled relationship when she learns that her mother (Patricia Clarkson) is dying of cancer.

title: Practical Magic
description: Sibling witches Sandra Bullock and Nicole Kidman stir up a cauldron of trouble thanks to a family curse in this spellbinding tale.

title: The Turkey Bowl
description: A man is pulled back to his rural hometown by his high school buddies on Thanksgiving to finish the Turkey Bowl - a football game against their cross town rivals that was snowed out 15 years prior.

title: The Bank Job
description: A 1971 bank heist yields not just a fortune but a wealth of state secrets.

title: Cortex
description: A retired lawman (André Dussollier) who has Alzheimer's disease suspects that a serial killer is loose in his nursing home.

title: Criminal Law
description: Attorney Ben Chase successfully defends accused killer Martin Thiel.  It is only after proving his client's innocence by discrediting eyewitness,  that Chase discovers Thiel is guilty--and intends to kill again.

title: Desperate Hours
description: An escaped convict and his two partners invade the home of an estranged Utah couple.

title: Deuces Wild
description: In the summer of 1958 Brooklyn was in a state of unrest. Rumbles escalated into gunfights and honor quickly became a thing of the past. A new breed of wiseguys threatened to take control of Brooklyn's streets, but one gang would not back down: the Deuces.

title: The Man From London
description: A switchman at a seaside railway witnesses a murder but does not report it after he finds a suitcase full of money at the scene of the crime.

title: Slow Burn
description: A district attorney who's running for mayor suddenly finds himself embroiled in a case of murder and financial corruption in this edgy thriller starring Ray Liotta, LL Cool J, Jolene Blalock, Mekhi Phifer, Taye Diggs and Chewitel Ejiofor.

title: This World, Then the Fireworks
description: Fraternal twin grifters Marty and Carol Lakewood reunite in their mother's California home after suffering personal and professional failures.

title: Religulous
description: Bill Maher goes on a humorous pilgrimage around the world to question people's faith and find out why they believe in God.

title: The Search for General Tso
description: This mouthwateringly entertaining documentary traces the surprising origins of the iconic Chinese-American dish, from Shanghai to Middle America and beyond.

title: The Shock Doctrine
description: Filmmakers Michael Winterbottom and Mat Whitecross use lectures by Naomi Klein, newsreel footage and analysis to explain the connection between politics and economics.

title: 12 and Holding
description: Three teens navigating the dark side of suburbia are forced to make sense of some very adult issues in this film from Michael Cuesta (L.I.E.).

title: Absolute Power
description: A jewel thief has to prove his innocence after being framed for a murder involving the U.S. president.

title: Any Given Sunday
description: Academy Award winner Al Pacino and Cameron Diaz lead a stellar cast in Oscar winner Oliver Stone's hard-hitting homage to the gridiron gladiators of Any Given Sunday.

title: Birdwatchers
description: In Brazil, tensions rise when the leader of a group of Guarani Indians organizes an attempt to reclaim his tribe's ancestral territory from an unsympathetic farmer.

title: Call Me
description: Anna is the curious recipient of obscene phone calls that she assumes are from her boyfriend. When she arrives to meet the bizarre caller at a bar, Anna witnesses a brutal murder and becomes an unwilling player in a game of cat-and-mouse.

title: Carrington
description: In this fact-based film, painter Dora Carrington (Emma Thompson) develops an intimate but extremely complex bond with writer Lytton Strachey (Jonathan Pryce). Though Lytton is a homosexual, he is enchanted by the mysterious Dora and they begin a lifelong friendship that has strangely romantic undertones. Eventually, Lytton and Dora decide to live together, despite the fact that the latter has fallen in love with military man Ralph Partridge (Steven Waddington), whom she plans to marry.

title: Daddy's Little Girls
description: Monty, a garage mechanic who lives in a poor neighborhood and struggles to make ends meet raising his three young daughters on his own. But when the courts award custody of his daughters to his corrupt, ex-wife, Monty tries to win them back.

title: De-Lovely
description: Biography of the life of composer and songwriter Cole Porter, a kid from Indiana who became a household name. The focus is how Porter, a gay man, found his inspiration from the woman he married, socialite Linda Lee Porter.

title: The End Of Violence
description: The line between life and art blur when a Hollywood producer known for violent action films is himself kidnapped by armed bandits and must find a way to escape from their bloody grasp.

title: Hoosiers
description: Gene Hackman stars as a basketball coach who guides a tiny Indiana high-school team to a state title in this sports classic.

title: The Impossible
description: An account of a family caught in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

title: Julia
description: This Oscar-winning drama, based on the writing of Lillian Hellman, depicts the relationship between two friends and its unexpected consequences. After Lillian (Jane Fonda), a renowned playwright, reunites in Russia with her childhood playmate Julia (Vanessa Redgrave), the writer is recruited to smuggle funds into Germany to aid the anti-Nazi movement. Waiting in the wings is Lillian's lover and mentor, Dashiell Hammett (Jason Robards), who is unaware of her dangerous assignment.

title: Man of La Mancha
description: Peter O'Toole dreams of unsullied love and unending gallantry as Don Quixote in this magnificent film version of the stage success. Sophia Loren and James Coco round out the cast.

title: Notorious
description: The rise of the Notorious B.I.G. to rap music fame, his relationships with Sean Combs and Tupac Shakur, and his tragic death.

title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
description: Interweaving vignettes show the intricacies in the lives of a doctor, a tarot-card reader and other diverse women.

title: The Waiting Room
description: A chance meeting at a train station leads a man and woman to make hard but beneficial changes for themselves.

title: The Weight of Water
description: A century-old double murder haunts Jean, a photographer who travels to the scene of the crime, to investigate. As Jean delves deeper into the case, she discovers the man convicted for the killings may not have been the murderer.

title: An American Haunting
description: In 1818, the family began to experience disturbances on their property. At first, slight, unexplained noises, but everything changed when the spirit began to grow, becoming aggressive and singling out the father, John.

title: The Host
description: A creature plunges from a bridge into the Han River, emerging on its shores for a feeding frenzy upon onlookers. When a young girl is snatched in the melee, her family sets off to recover her from the monster.

title: Jessabelle
description: Trauma sends a young woman back to her father's Louisiana home, where she is haunted by an evil presence.

title: The Last House on the Left (Unrated)
description: Two girls are tortured and left to die after they become captives of four prison escapees.  The merciless criminals end up in the house of one of the girls and the mother tortures and kills them.

title: The Omen
description: When the U.S. Ambassador to England begins to suspect that his son is the Anti-Christ, he must wrestle with the decision to kill the child.

title: The Woods
description: A tormented teen (Agnes Bruckner) has terrifying visions, while her classmates at a remote boarding-school for girls go missing.

title: Twilight
description: When teenager Bella Swan falls in love with vampire Edward Cullen, she becomes the target of a group of hostile vampires.

title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, Part 1
description: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, Part 2
description: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
description: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
description: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship - this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

title: The House on Carroll Street
description: During a time of anti-Communist paranoia, editor Emily Crane (Kelly McGillis) balks at turning over the identities of colleagues being sought by the House Un-American Activities Committee and is blacklisted as a result. After taking a job as an elderly woman's companion, her life falls into a normal rhythm -- until she checks out an argument in the house next door. Soon Emily is on the run and trying to unravel a Nazi plot. Meanwhile, Cochran (Jeff Daniels), an FBI man, tries to protect her.

title: Megalobox
description:
The protagonist of the story is a young man with no origin and known only by his ring name: “JNK.DOG”. He survives by fighting in rigged, underground matches of a sport called Megalobox, a form of fighting utilizing powered exoskeletons. 
JD is bored, resigned and unfulfilled—until the day he encounters Yuri, the reigning champion of the official Megalobox sport.

title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
description: Wrapped up in the endearing humor and physical comedy that made the Madagascar movies so popular, Madagascar: A Little Wild is a CG, musical comedy series featuring Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman as young residents of a rescue habitat in the Central Park Zoo. Like everybody who lands in New York, these kids have big dreams and big plans. The series celebrates being yourself, never giving up, and pursuing your dreams with abandon, no matter the size.

title: Odeon
description: A sneak peek into the lives of different individuals in a world known as ODEON. Presented by Cake on FX.

title: Sad Day
description: A girl walks into a noodle shop late at night in this short music film from FKA twigs and Hiro Murai.

title: Woke
description: Inspired by the life and work of artist Keith Knight, comedy series WOKE takes an absurdly irreverent look at identity and culture as it follows Keef, an African-American cartoonist finally on the verge of mainstream success when an unexpected incident changes everything. With a fresh outlook on the world around him, Keef must now navigate the new voices and ideas that confront and challenge him, all without setting aflame everything he’s already built.

title: Bucket List Bistro
description:
Taste of FOX presents: Bucket List Bistro, hosted by actress and singer Christy Carlson Romano. During a time when most of America longs for the ability to travel around the world, folks are looking for little escapes from the safety of their own home. Enter BUCKET LIST BISTRO - the solution for a quick fix to satiate the collective wanderlust. This serialized content will give folks at home a little taste of the travel they crave, one location and group of taste buds at a time.

Inspired by being stuck working from home due to COVID-19 and being a parent of young children, Christy is constantly fantasizing about where she would like to go and visit once her girls can come along and this pandemic becomes a thing of the past. Since many folks have wanderlust right now in a BIG way, BUCKET LIST BISTRO will help them feel a little closer to the places they are dying to go to—through a Taste of FOX! In this show, Christy will take viewers to different, exotic and fun locales with dishes and recipes from places on my travel bucket list. Whether it’s because of having young kids, quarantine, a tight budget, or no time, BUCKET LIST BISTRO will help people feel connected to the world they are longing to be out in again.

title: Dark Side of the Ring: After Dark
description: Hosted by wrestling-obsessed comedian Chris Gethard, this after show series further investigates the stories and themes following each gripping Dark Side of the Ring episode and celebrates wrestling subculture with a panel of celebrity guests.

title: First Day
description: It’s Hannah Bradford’s first year of middle school. As a transgender girl, Hannah not only has to navigate the challenges that come with starting a new school, but find the courage to live as her most authentic self.

title: Brother vs. Brother
description: Drew and Jonathan Scott, aka The Property Brothers, will be pitted against one another as they each mentor a team of five talented renovators who compete in weekly challenges to raise property values in comparable homes. Whichever house has the highest property-value increase wins. The weak link from the losing team will be eliminated until only one remains. Which brother's team will win? The last man (or woman) standing gets $50,000 in cash!

title: Vacation In Place
description: Can’t get away these days? Let these immersive, relaxing scenes take you to some of the most beautiful places around. Choose from lakes, beaches, rolling hills, and endless skies … Take your pick and have a mini-vacay from wherever you are .

title: Chadwick Boseman - A Tribute for a King
description: An ABC News special examines his career, from playing Jackie Robinson, Thurgood Marshall, to T'Challa in "Black Panther." His influence was felt far beyond Hollywood, all the way to the White House.

title: The Republican National Convention -- Your Voice/Your Vote 2020
description: The 2020 Republican National Convention features appearances by First Lady Melania Trump, Vice President Mike Pence and President Donald Trump.

title: The Ticket: The First Interview -- A Special Edition of 20/20
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden sits down for his first joint interview with running mate Kamala Harris.

title: Ghost Adventures: Screaming Room
description: Zak Bagans and his crew investigate the most haunted places in the world. During the dusk-to-dawn lockdown, key evidence is documented to uncover the truth behind paranormal activity.
